attributes.review:
I have to provide my personal information to use the app? Really?!?
It's one thing to pay .99c for an app. It's entirely another to have to pay with your (very valuable) private information. Delete.
attributes.title: Personal Info Mandatory

attributes.review: Thank you for having an app that keeps us informed!
attributes.title: Trump 2016

attributes.review: Great app for a great person. Together we can make Apps great again!

attributes.review: It is an app to win an election! The potential of mobilizing millions of people is at hand!
